Average male & female heights in Netherlands and US
Year   Dutch male Dutch female  US male US female
1900 170.14  155.82  171.48  158.74
1910 171.95  158.31  172.52  159.34
1920 173.95  160.99  173.82  160.32
1930 175.70  163.28  175.25  161.69
1940 177.51  165.2   176.4   162.91
1950 179.26  166.45  177.06  163.36
1960 181.11  167.84  177.29  163.76
1970 182.18  168.85  177.4   164.02
1980 182.55  168.94  177.53  163.84
1990 182.55  168.8   177.3    163.65
